notes.text: Graduate-level coursework in computer vision, image processing, and signal processing.

items.title: ECE 692 - Computer Vision
items.subtitle: Advanced topics in computer vision covering state-of-the-art methods for visual recognition, scene understanding, and 3D reconstruction.

items.title: ECE 572 - Digital Image Processing
items.subtitle: Comprehensive study of digital image processing techniques including image acquisition, enhancement, restoration, compression, morphological processing, segmentation, and analysis.

items.title: ECE 505 - Digital Signal Processing
items.subtitle: Analysis and design of digital signal processing systems, covering discrete-time signals, Z-transforms, digital filters, FFT algorithms, and DSP applications.
